md:
giải nghĩa từ "exhibited" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

**Exhibited** (verb)

* Meaning: to show or display something publicly, especially in an exhibition or a museum.
* Vietnamese: trưng bày, trưng ra, biểu diễn.

Example sentences:

* The museum exhibited a collection of ancient artifacts.
* The artist exhibited her paintings at the gallery.
* The company exhibited its new products at the trade show.

Related words:

* Exhibition (n.) - a public display of works of art, products, etc.
* Display (v.) - to show or exhibit something.
* Showcase (v.) - to display or exhibit something in a prominent way.

Antonyms:

* Conceal (v.) - to hide or cover something.
* Hide (v.) - to conceal or keep something out of sight.
* Withhold (v.) - to keep something back or not show it.
